entry.cap:areaDesc: Jackson Hole; South Lincoln County; Star Valley

entry.title: Flood Advisory issued March 18 at 1:01PM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...FLOOD ADVISORY FOR ICE JAMS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by ice jams. * WHERE...A portion of north central Wyoming, including the following county, Big Horn. Flooding is most likely to occur on the Bighorn River from around Manderson to Greybull, and on the Nowood River in Big Horn County.
entry.cap:areaDesc: Big Horn
